arChildNodes.szComment: Ogai stands before the Grinning One's shrine,  mumbling to himself, frustrated. He can feel he is near to success, but impatient.
Ogai tries to calm himself, speak to reason.
Ogai speaks to the player, recalling images he saw during his bone dust trance--a labyrinth of the Grinning One
Ogai shares the Grinning One's desires--the need to have its offerings returned to prove Ogai's worth.
Ogai clarifies that he is not fit for fighting demons in the dark, voicing so to the player.
Ogai turns hopeful, claiming the "brave" player can do the dangerous work for him.
Ogai attempts to convince the player to do his dirty work, saying they may be rewarded with the Grinning One's words, too.
